title: [Vornavian Coast, The Lagoon]
description: Huge, smooth slabs of stone lie on the shore of the lagoon here, dimly visible in the evening light.  The moon's rays glitter upon the reflective surface of the lagoon.

Huge, smooth slabs of stone lie on the shore of the lagoon here, gathering warmth from the sunlight bearing down on them.  Lizards and snakes sun themselves on the rocks, eyeing the occasional bird that comes too close.
